programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin bets Bo Carter that alien life exists and only has a week to prove it or suffer embarrassing consequences. Brittanys furious when she thinks Alvin has been writing on her blog and vows to get him back.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: To land the lead role in a play, Alvin wagers Brittany that he can remain in character as a shoe cobbler. When Brittany becomes convinced shes a long-lost princess, she carries her new royal status a little too far.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Simons interactive video game is about to take off, until Jeanette reprograms the games villain; when Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesnt play.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: After a fight with Brittany, Eleanor decides to move in with Alvin and his brothers. Theodore posts a video of himself rapping on the Internet and it becomes a big hit.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittany takes up painting to impress her fashion idol, but her idol only likes her art after Alvin ruins it; Alvin is convinced that Julie and her son are trying to move in to their home, so he tries to stop the invasion.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin borrows Simons invisibility suit, but gets trapped when the zipper gets stuck. After Theodore makes a wish, the Chipmunks try to learn what it was so they can make it come true.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin thinks Theodores teddy bear can tell the future, Alvin goes all out to make Talking Teddy his friend. Alvin lies to Theodore about a fake holiday to get out of chores, so Dave forces Alvin to make the holiday real.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave is thrilled when he thinks hes nominated for a Grammy, but its actually an award for aging musicians. Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to a convention.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: In an effort to be more productive, Simon invents a device that can override the need to sleep; Alvin gets a taste of his own medicine when he zaps Dave with a youth ray, turning him into an irresponsible teen.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When an accident forces Simon to wear his old glasses, he becomes the target of the school bully. So Simon builds a homemade robot bodyguard!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave is working on an important new song for the music festival, but the Chipmunks accidentally ruin it. Can they fix it in time for the big performance?

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: In order to get Theodore to do his bidding, Alvin tells him that he has secret powers and can turn trash into candy; when the chipmunks find a baby bird that has fallen from its nest, Alvin is reluctant to get too attached.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: After Brittany and the girls release a video that goes viral, Alvin, Simon, and Theodore try to top it. Simon falls ill and asks Alvin and Theodore not to go see a new movie without him, but Alvin just cannot resist.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave gets temporary amnesia so the boys trick him into letting them skip school and go on a ski trip instead. Theodore becomes obsessed with cleanliness after a speaker at school talks to the class about the danger of germs.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: Big Bro Theodore / No Putts, No Glory
programme.desc: When Theodore mistakenly thinks hes the oldest brother, he tries to be a better role model for Alvin and Simon. Alvin tricks Theodore into believing hes great at mini golf, which backfires when Theo signs up for a tournament.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: The Curse Of Macbeth / Zeela The Great
programme.desc: The Chipmunks dont want to perform in the school play, after learning of its curse; Simons robot Geizmo becomes jealous of Jeanettes robot Zeela, until a sudden tragedy reveals Geizmos true heart.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin and Brittany wind up in a battle over popping acorn tops and bubble wrap. When a cute girl joins the chess club, Alvin enlists Jeanette to teach him how to play so he can join as well.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Desperate to avenge last years humiliating loss, the chipmunks argue over who is best suited to lead them to victory; Alvin grows tired of seeing his celebrity status overshadowed by reality TV stars, so he decides to become one himself.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: After learning about the Knights of the Round Table, Theodore wants to be a knight and struggles to do good deeds. Alvin and Simon create a fake snake to help Dave get over his fear of snakes.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave discovers hes not too good at roughing it outdoors when he goes on a day hike with the Chipettes. When Alvin pranks Simon with a trick website making it look like Alvin is smarter, the chipettes prank Alvin back.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Chipmunks and Chipettes compete in a dodgeball tournament but no-one expects Theo to be their secret weapon. The Chipmunks find a shack that magically fills with toys and games, but is it magic or something more sinister.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: Of Mice and Munks; Simon Saves the World
programme.desc: The Chipettes fall in love with a mouse thats doomed to be fed to a snake as part of a science class; Simons new invention threatens to destroy the world.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave writes a hit love song from a poem he found; since Simon wrote the poem, he panics his secret will come out.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin is paired with Simon to work on a science project, he accidentally creates a potion that turns Theodore into a giant. When all the childrens phones go missing at school, Alvin is blamed for the theft and sets out to clear his name.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Brittany is hurt before a major school event, Jeanette fills in as the Principals assistant. When Bocarters father helps him with his class project, Alvin enlists Daves help, locking the families in a heated competition.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: School Alone; It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: Alvin and Brittany get stuck alone at the school with a ghost they think roams the halls. Alvin passes off a rock he found on the ground as a meteor for a science project and gets some unwanted attention.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin accuses Dave of yelling at him too much, a therapist moves in to help Dave control his anger. When the school digs up an old high school time capsule, Miss Smith and Dave work together to keep an old secret.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvins too short to ride a new amusement park ride; while on a ski trip, Alvin convinces Theodore theres a Yeti nearby.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: A single father experiences the trials and tribulations of raising a group of young chipmunks who are also famous rock stars touring the world with their best friends, the Chipettes.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittanys style icon proclaims Jeanette is a fashion trendsetter; Theodore thinks that he is a real superhero.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: Were the Chipmunks; Save the Dance
programme.desc: When a new boy band, The Hipmunks, tries to steal the spotlight, the Chipmunks are forced to compete in a battle of the bands. The Principal gives Alvin and Derek an ultimatum, if they fight, the school dance will be cancelled.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When the boys get stuck with Miss Miller as a baby sitter, they each take a crack at finding a replacement. Alvin volunteers to caddy a charity golf tournament and surprisingly gets paired up with Miss Smith.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin talks Dave into buying a used tour bus, Dave has no idea of the problems ahead. Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Eleanor prepares her signature cake for the big Bake-Off competition and leaves it out to cool.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: A favourite toy of Theodores is lost on a rafting trip but then mysteriously shows up at the house.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin plays a trick on Theodores pancakes. Alvin wants to take over the drum kit.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: A Room of Ones Own; Carts and Crafts
programme.desc: Alvin convinces Dave to give him his own room; after Alvin inadvertently destroys Theodores bike, he enters the boys in a round up of shopping carts where the first prize is a new bike.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.sub-title: Its My Party; Keeping Up with the Humphries
programme.desc: When the kids tease Kevin about his lame parties, Alvin decides to host the coolest paintball party at his house, for Kevin. When Bocarter boasts about his cool computer, the boys feel pressure to keep up with their nemesis and end up causing a disaster.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When the boys get tired of taking orders from Dave, they decide to build a tree house in the backyard and move out. When an invention of Simons accidentally gets knocked over it magnetizes Alvin and Simon making them inseparable.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When pirates show up at the house, the boys do all they can to protect a treasure chest that arrived for Dave. The Chipmunks and Chipettes compete to set a world record in hopes of winning a new virtual reality game.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: After getting detention again, Alvins convinced Dave will drive him to the desert and abandon him there; Alvin and Theodore play a seemingly innocent game, which leads to unexpected consequences.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Tempers flare when the Chipmunks get stuck in traffic on the way to a show. Simon becomes annoyed by constant requests to fix things and plays dumb until he gets a thank you.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave worries that the Chipmunks have become addicted to a video game. A grounded Alvin begs Theodore to buy him a limited edition skateboard.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Simon creates a Super Hero costume for a convention hes attending. But when Alvin wants to join, the two fight over who the real hero is. When Alvins bicycle is stolen, he joins forces with Officer Dangus to solve the case.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Theodore is stuck taking care of Miss Croners cats during a week that Dave wants the boys to focus only on school. The Chipettes challenge the Chipmunks to go three hours without their favourite things.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: Heroes of the Somme
programme.desc: Documentary in which military historian Dr Gavin Hughes uses original archive from the Western Front to uncover the stories of seven of the men whose remarkable bravery won them the Victoria Cross, Britains most prized military medal. programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: Two brides let their bridesmaids choose their own dresses; a missing bridesmaids dress.

programme.title: Say Yes To The Dress: Lancashire
programme.desc: Hannah is no longer sure she wants the huge princess gown she dreamed of as a child. Plus, Lisa turns up to the boutique with her fiance.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Tamika brings her wedding planner to the salon; Ashley wants to look like a princess; Sandras unusual wedding dress.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: A woman has overcome tremendous obstacles to get to the salon.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.sub-title: When the Leading Man Takes a Stand
programme.desc: To Kiara, the only opinion that matters is her grandfathers. But when she likes a dress over budget, she may risk leaving the salon empty handed.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Jibrell wants to look like a princess, but her mother turns her dress dreams into a nightmare. Plus, Kassie struggles to find a gown without her late mother.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: After four marriages, 36-year-old Carol Grannon returned to school and got a lucrative job. But, one of her men ended her life as this new chapter began.

programme.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn
programme.desc: When two young women are murdered on the same scenic bike trail just months apart, police are baffled by the similarities of their deaths.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: When Rhonda Daugherty vanishes, detectives turn to the public for information. A tip leads to surveillance footage from a hotel that uncovers a journey of deceit.

programme.title: Faking It: Tears of a Crime
programme.desc: Looking at the phenomenon of high-profile criminal cases where people publically claim they are innocent about a crime they have committed.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Ann Metz lives for her family, particularly her two beautiful granddaughters; her husband Marshall despises Anns giving her time to anyone but him, and he will go to desperate measures to keep hold of her.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: The lives of a beautiful young family in Long Beach, New York, rip apart when five-year-old Audrey witnesses her mother, Diane, brutally stabbed to death. To Audreys horror, her mothers murderer is somebody very close to home.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: When 15-year-old Kayla Berg isnt home after a night out, her loved ones think shes staying with friends. After six days, her last known location raises suspicion.

programme.title: Judge Rinders Crime Stories
programme.desc: Examining a devastating murder case of a girl whose younger sister was also dying of terminal cancer, and a story about an unscrupulous gang of puppy traders who were selling sick and dying puppies.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: In 2019, after a night out with friends, college student Samantha Josephson climbs into a car she mistakes for her rideshare, never to be seen alive again. With little to go on, police must rely on CCTV footage to help pick up the killers trail.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Ashleys new confidence enrages estranged husband Terry, who stalks her to a secluded lot, ready to reclaim control in the deadliest way.

programme.title: The Killer In My Family
programme.desc: Relatives of Lisa Montgomery speak about when she strangled a pregnant woman. They discuss their belief that her mental health and history of serious sexual abuse led to her murder.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: A quiet town is shaken to its core when an innocent woman is gunned down in broad daylight; detectives desperately act to find her killer and restore the peace.

programme.title: Faking It: Tears of a Crime
programme.desc: Flying ace Russell Williams rose to the highest ranks of the military whilst leading a shocking double life as a rapist and murderer. Finding out how the British-born Colonel gave himself away as one of Canadas most feared and dangerous criminals.

programme.title: Faking It: Tears of a Crime
programme.desc: Andrew Burfield killed his ex-partner Katie Kenyon with an axe, then claimed her death was the result of a freak accident. Police learned he had not only lied but had planned the whole thing.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: Two college students are gunned down while parked in a quiet lane in Juliette, Georgia. The small community is beside itself with panic.

programme.title: You Belong to Me: Sex, Race and Murder in the South
programme.desc: In 1952, a prominent black woman killed a white doctor in Florida after suffering years of sexual abuse at his hands. Despite abundant evidence that she was acting in self-defence, a jury found her guilty and sentenced her to death.

programme.title: Surviving Sinaga
programme.desc: Reynhard Sinaga is the UKs most prolific rapist. Meeting men outside Manchester nightclubs, he drugged, sexually assaulted and filmed his depraved acts with at least 200 young men for the past 12 years. Featuring interviews with those affected.

programme.title: The Arrest
programme.desc: The arrest and judicial process leaves many with permanent damage, so Toronto lawyer Davin Charney fights for the wrongly charged, demanding justice and compensation for those who have been hurt by the system.

programme.title: No Visible Trauma
programme.desc: The stories of three individuals who were the victims of police brutality in Calgary, Canada.

programme.title: Behind the Screams
programme.desc: A bartender goes missing in Wisconsin, but its only when another woman of the same age disappears that local sheriffs start putting together the pieces of a very strange puzzle.

programme.title: Behind the Screams
programme.desc: The disappearance of two young women prompts an investigation. As more women go missing and bodies start to appear, detectives are led to the handsome Ted Bundy.

programme.title: Behind the Screams
programme.desc: When teenage boys start to go missing in Chicago in the 1970s, investigators have a difficult time making a connection, but they eventually figure out that all these boys share a connection; based on the movie, `Killer Clown.

programme.title: Infamous Crime Scenes: OJ
programme.desc: Turn back the clock and uncover the truth behind the OJ Simpson trial.

programme.title: Great Crimes and Trials
programme.desc: When the body of a young girl is found, the paedophile living nearby is the prime suspect. This inspired Sarahs Law, which grants the UK public information on sex offenders.

programme.title: The Trayvon Hoax: Unmasking the Witness Fraud That Divided America
programme.desc: A look into the trial of George Zimmerman for the murder of Trayvon Martin.

programme.title: Oscar Pistorius: The Shocking Release
programme.desc: A plunge into the evening of the murder, the controversial trial, and Oscars early release from prison.

programme.title: The Krays: The Myth Behind the Legend
programme.desc: Rivals and other contemporaries discuss gangsters Ronnie and Reggie Kray, who ran Londons East End.

programme.title: Dangerous Company
programme.desc: A couple of Kentucky blue bloods team up to form a front for their drug smuggling business. As the operation grows, so too does the paranoia and betrayal.

programme.title: The Unperfect Crime
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the 1997 Loomis-Fargo armoured car heist in North Carolina and the serio-comic fates of its underdog perpetrators. who fell victim to avarice, mutual betrayals and false romantic promises.

programme.title: Gangster No. 1: The Freddie Foreman Story
programme.desc: Attached to almost every unsolved gangland murder in London over the last 50 years, Freddie Foreman is the `Godfather of Britains criminal underworld. Foreman reveals the audacious details of the heists, double crossings, shootouts, murders and betrayals he was involved in, and ultimately, what has made him `Gangster Number.1.

programme.title: Behind the Screams
programme.desc: When a teenage boy begins to act very strangely, his parents are not sure what to think, but as his behaviour becomes more disturbing, they become convinced their son is consumed by evil; based on the movie, `The Exorcist.

programme.title: Behind the Screams
programme.desc: A large family moves into an old rural farmhouse hoping to give their kids a simpler life, but the family is soon terrorised by unseen spirits; based on the movie, `The Conjuring.

programme.title: The Trayvon Hoax: Unmasking the Witness Fraud That Divided America
programme.desc: A look into the trial of George Zimmerman for the murder of Trayvon Martin.

programme.title: The Trayvon Hoax: Unmasking the Witness Fraud That Divided America
programme.desc: A look into the trial of George Zimmerman for the murder of Trayvon Martin.

programme.title: Wild Faces of Switzerland
programme.desc: Graubunden in winter means lots of fun on the slopes. In nature, however, there is a struggle for survival because of the cold. The film tells astonishing stories from the wintry nature of Graubunden and shows magnificent landscape shots.

programme.title: Megeti - Africas Lost Wolf
programme.desc: The story of the Ethiopian she-wolf Megeti, who lost her pack and is suddenly completely on her own. Since it is essential for the survival of the young wolf to rejoin a pack, she wanders through the Ethiopian highlands in search of a new home.

programme.title: Ian Redmond: The Ally of Cave Elephants
programme.desc: Ian Redmond desires nothing more than to meet Kali again. In his search of her, he comes closer to answering the question of why she attacked him and to uncovering the secrets of the cave elephants.

programme.title: Giants of Fortune
programme.desc: On the Filipino island of Cebu, the ravages of typhoons and over-fishing have made livelihoods scarce for islanders. It seems bleak for Zosimo and his family until the worlds biggest fish, the whale shark, changes everything.

programme.title: Wild Faces of Switzerland
programme.desc: Learn about four different regions of Switzerland. From the rugged mountains of the Ticino High Alps to the lovely Muggio Valley in the southernmost corner of Ticino, hardly any other canton is so full of contrasts.

programme.title: Wild Faces of Switzerland
programme.desc: The river called Aare is the only body of water that runs through Switzerland. It rises from a source in the Bernese Alps and finally flows into the Rhine. The Aare offers important habitat for flora and fauna.

programme.title: Wild Galapagos
programme.sub-title: In the Grip of the Ocean
programme.desc: The reef life, and the birds, lizards and reptiles that cope with the lava rock islands of the Galapagos, make this remote series of islands a unique natural habitat.

programme.title: Wild Galapagos
programme.desc: The Galapagos Islands are home to animals that have made adaptations, including penguins, iguanas, tortoises, cormorants and - possibly the oddest - the vampire finch.

programme.title: Chandani: The Daughter of the Elephant Whisperer
programme.desc: Chandani has a burning desire to follow in her fathers footsteps and become a mahout. A Mahout takes care about elephants.

programme.title: Equator
programme.desc: The Equator is not only the line that divides the Earth, it is also the evolutionary powerhouse of the world. See its effect on the Galapagos.

programme.title: Cheetah: Beating the Odds
programme.desc: A cheetah raises her young family on the vast expanse of the Serengeti, facing enormous challenges. Lions are quick to throw their muscle around, and hyenas and jackals attempt to steal anything the cheetah manages to kill.

programme.title: Hidden Spain
programme.desc: Spain is found at the crossroads between the Mediterranean and the Atlantic, resulting in diverse landscapes, ancient cultures and magnificent wildlife.

programme.title: Hidden Australia
programme.desc: Australia is known for its sun-kissed beaches, however the 2,500 miles between the coasts are made up of a patchwork of contrasting landscapes, such as tropical rainforests, snow-capped mountains, dry woodlands, tropical reefs, and hostile desert.

programme.title: Sperm Whales, Dealing With the Unexpected
programme.desc: A family of sperm whales deals with rapid changes to its environment near the Crozet Islands.

programme.title: Sharks - Scavengers of the Sea
programme.desc: Before being an earthly paradise with enchanting colours, the lagoon of New Caledonia is above all a paradise for sharks. Usually considered as fierce predators, sharks really are opportunistic scavengers. Scavengers that are not too picky when it comes to their menu. Filmed for four years in New Caledonia, this documentary shows footage of sharks never seen before.

programme.title: Lioness in Exile
programme.desc: Manyari takes an unusual step when she takes her young cubs away from the sanctuary of the clan.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew seeks standout items to lure more customers to his shop. In Derbyshire, he finds a Regency picture frame, and buys a pair of Danish rattan chairs in Harrogate.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew is always hunting undiscovered treasures. He has a rare chance to scour the wild items at Chester Zoo. And in Leicestershire, he unearths a royal relic.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Charles Hanson and Catherine Southon go on an antiques adventure around Kent before heading to an auction in Buckinghamshire. Catherine ditches the classic car in favour of travelling by horse and cart.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen pool their talents and resources to restore heirlooms and treasured antiques such as music boxes, vases and clocks to prove that anything can be restored to its former glory.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.sub-title: Toolmakers Box, Plate Camera, Marionette Theatre
programme.desc: The skills of both furniture restorer Will Kirk and metalwork specialist Dominic Chinea are called upon when Carol Reynolds from Belfast walks through the barn doors with an item that personifies someone very dear to her. The oak box belonged to her late father, who was a toolmaker at an engineering firm. He kept the instruments of his trade, along with his sketchbooks and calculations.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Sarah Moore rescues three unwanted items from Wallyford recycling centre in East Lothian. She turns to artisan bag-maker Rosanna Gethin to come up with a creative use for an old tartan picnic rug, while upcycler Rachel Henderson is tasked with transforming a set of tired chairs from dull to desirable. Sarah takes on the ambitious project of restyling a vintage glass display cabinet.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: The incredible story of separated sisters that previously hit the headlines. The search follows one of the sisters delving into her past and reveals layers of family that she never knew existed.

programme.title: Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antique experts Charles Hanson and Christina Trevanion are road tripping around Yorkshire. Charles makes an unscheduled pit stop and finds an exciting artefact in a toilet while Christina is literally dancing for joy with one of her purchases, a lovely 1930s party dress.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Christina gets bitten by the keep fit bug and buys some vintage weights while Charles purchases an unusual artefact, a Victorian skirt lifter, but only after a demonstration from a blushing dealer. A short detour allows Christina to learn about a thousand year old custom in the village of Ripon.

programme.title: Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team help celebrities clear their homes of clutter. Will they discover hidden gems to be auctioned off for serious profit?

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Foundlings are people who were abandoned as babies, often in the first hours and days of their lives. Born without a trace, they have had no way to unlock the secrets of their past. By combining new DNA technology with painstaking detective work, the mysteries of people with unknown beginnings who are desperate for answers can now be solved. Presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell, the team behind `Long Lost Family use an extraordinary new technique to try and identify birth families and find answers for people who have spent decades trying to find out where they came from.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the documentary series which aims to reunite family members after years of separation and which offers a lifeline for people who are desperate to find long-lost relatives.

programme.title: The Repair Shop

Now totally scorched, Jody would like her beloved toy to be restored so she can pass it on to her young son Noah.

programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: Tongue-in-cheek tale about a high-speed car chase across America involving a sheriff and a bootlegger with crash stunts galore. All goes well for the Bandit as he drives from Texas to Georgia with a truckload of illicit beer until he stops to pick up a damsel in distress, who also happens to be the sheriffs daughter.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A cynical TV weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again when he goes on location to the small town of Punxsutawney to film a report about their annual Groundhog Day. His predicament drives him to distraction, until he sees a way of turning the situation to his advantage.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: The Danish Girl

programme.title: The Fisher King

Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: A long-smouldering flame is rekindled when a once-popular opera star reunites with her ex-husband and fellow performers at a retirement home for musicians.

programme.title: Grease

Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: When Rydell new boy Michael meets hot Pink Lady Stephanie he is instantly smitten, but Michaels a geek and top T-Bird Johnny wants Stephanie back. Will an image change help him get the girl?

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: Michael Oher is a poor and undereducated African-American teenager who lived all his life on the streets. His tremendous size and quickness makes him a perfect athlete and attracts the interest if a wealthy and conservative suburban family who take him in and groom him both athletically and academically.

programme.title: The Danish Girl

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Hardings life and legacy instantly become tarnished as shes forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
programme.desc: The Spy Kids set off on their third adventure. Secret Agent Carmen finds herself trapped in a 3-D virtual reality video game designed by their new arch nemesis, the Toymaker. Juni must save his sister, as they battle it out against lifelike 3-D monsters, completing each progressively harder level and ultimately trying to save the youth of the world.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter cant seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Mortician

programme.title: The Mortician

programme.title: Barbie Uncovered

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Madame Au Lait is called away to give Chikidee her ping pong lesson, Tommy and Tallulah bake a massive sticky carroty cake on their own. Ignoring the recipe, they make so much mixture that the oven explodes when they try to cook it, showering the whole town with sticky gunk and bringing Pufferty to a standstill! The race is on to free him before Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are having fun helping their friends, but dont stop first to ask what their friends need. So Lopsiloo finds herself on the wrong side of the bridge, the wrong goods are served in Battersbys shop and Puffertys favourite ball is thrown out when they tidy his kennel. It is only when they take McCogginss scooter away for cleaning that they finally realise the error of their ways.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Madame Au Lait is cleaning the clockhouse so Tommy and Tallulah take their jammy sandwiches to their room to eat. When some jam gets splodged on a blanket, they dont want to upset Madame Au Lait so they clean it themselves, but when they hang it out to dry on Pufferty, it floats off and lands in a muddy puddle! Whatever will Madame Au Lait say.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Chikidee is making slow but steady progress learning to fly, so Tommy and Tallulah try to help by making her a gigantic paper aeroplane. They dont realise, until its too late, that Chikidee cant control it and has no idea how to land! Chime Time is imminent but they cant leave their friend adrift in the sky. How can they talk her down safely?

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah offer to do the polishing so that Madame Au Lait can make their favourite fruity trifle. While she is out buying the ingredients, the twins go polish crazy, thinking that the more they use the happier Madame Au Lait will be and the more trifle she will make. The clockhouse is gleaming when Madame Au Lait returns, but when she sets a hoof on the floor she finds that it as slippery as an ice rink.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to collect McCogginss bell for a town performance. Despite Battersbys warning that the clapper is fragile and doesnt have a spare, Tommy and Tallulah manage to break it. Deciding that they must make a replacement, they look everywhere for something to use and try some very unusual options. Will the bell be ready for Chime Time?

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Tommy and Tallulah agree to babysit the spring chicks while Madame Au Lait tends to Mother Chicks hurt wing, they dont realise that how much of a handful the chicks will be. The twins are also taking part in the town kite display today, but somehow the chicks end up surfing on their kite, high in the sky! The twins must stage an airborne rescue before Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are organising McCogginss pile of interesting junk when a vitally important spring goes missing. They cant chime the time without it! The twins chase the spring all over town as it bounces around causing chaos, eventually ending up attaching Pufferty to his kennel. Every time he tries to go somewhere, the spring pulls him back.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety Town is covered in fallen leaves, so Tommy and Tallulah are using McCogginss new prototype street sweeper to clear them. programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.desc: In a kingdom that possesses Ancient technology, Sheppard finds himself a pawn in the rivalry between heirs to the throne.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Foreign diplomats touring an off-world research base are thrown into danger when an insidious insect species gets loose.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: The ship remains on Red Alert after Janeway and the Borg Collective agree to fight the destructive Species Eight Four Seven Two.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The immortal Q returns to fan the flames of romance between Picard and an archaeologist he met while on vacation.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.sub-title: Jacob Collier, Fatiha El-Ghorri, Jack Dee
programme.desc: The artists are challenged to capture on canvas the portrait of one of three celebrity sitters.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Officer Nolan and Celina take on a special case. Monica enlists help to identify her attackers. Lopez and Harper discover a connection to the trail of crimes.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Sgt. Grey helps the team prepare for their biggest mission yet; Aaron, Lopez, Celina, Tim and Smitty discover a surprising connection in their case.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Nick investigates a series of assaults.

programme.title: Warehouse 13
programme.desc: The team tries to find out why people are becoming vapourised after angering women.

programme.title: Warehouse 13
programme.desc: Pete and Myka track a troublesome taco truck, meanwhile Claudia reaches out to Jinks.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Law and Disorder
programme.desc: Documentary series charting the exploits of the City of London police, charged with safeguarding the Square Mile at the heart of the crime-ridden capital.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno
programme.desc: The Arabian landscape is a virtually waterless desert where rain scarcely falls and animals endure blistering temperatures. But for 3 months every year, a remote region on the south west coast undergoes an astonishing transformation... into a lush, verdant oasis.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: After weeks of battling a mysterious head infection, Erik joins the group two students. At forest school, the group three students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves hes more than just a class clown.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.sub-title: The Eclipse of the Pride Lands
programme.desc: The staff attempts to put radio transmitting collars on the lions to keep track of the population.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: For the first time since its founding, Ol Pejeta has a growing hyena population. Two of the research staff has to figure out how to take the first ever census of these very effective nocturnal hunters.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The staff wait to see if Joline the chimp will recover from her illness, 17-year-old chimpanzee Freddie doesnt seem to be his usual boisterous self and, in the nursery, youngsters Pip and Ben take a big step when they venture outside to play for the first time.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Mexican monkey Bryan meets his chimp foster mum Sally, but no one is sure if he has ever been around another chimpanzee before. Meanwhile, when Charlie is picked on by the other males in the group, Jim comes to his aid.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno
programme.desc: It sometimes feels like mammals rule the world; there are well over 5,000 species, colonising every corner of the globe. But in Arabia theres a different story - this is a land where reptiles rule.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: A two-year-old orangutan who was drugged and kept as an illegal pet by an oil sheik arrives at jungle school. Plus, angry male orangutan Jerry has gone missing and has not been seen for 18 days.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue
programme.sub-title: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family
programme.desc: The team in saves a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, a visit to the Rescue Centre, where a harbour seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.desc: Dr Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar and the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom, free two orphaned serval cats, and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.desc: Four North African White Rhinos are settled at Ol Pejeta. The staff must prepare them for a return, not just to life in a semi-wild environment, but also to try and trigger their wild instincts, particularly their desire to breed.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: The Black Rhino is the most endangered species in the world and when they start dying in rapid success, Ol Pejeta brings their expertise to help figure out whats killing them-before its too late.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Series two begins with a new arrival named Bryan, who strikes up a bond with one of the parks naughtiest residents. The adult orangutans, meanwhile, enjoy giant ice lollies.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Animal manager Jeremy is in Paris, collecting a baby orang-utan called Lingga, who will be joining Monkey Worlds ever-expanding orang-utan creche. Meanwhile, in Paddys chimp group, all hell breaks loose over a giant fruity freeze, and Alison must say her goodbyes to Julio, the woolly monkey she hand-reared from birth.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno
programme.sub-title: Life and Death in the Dunes
programme.desc: The Arabian Desert is one of the most challenging places on earth, but the animals here are resilient and specialised. Even for the hardiest inhabitants, deaths never far away. Creatures must seize every opportunity to find food, shelter and water. Adaptability is the key to dune survival.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: The orangutans seek shelter in the rainy season, and the staff help a lone baby sun bear threatened by rising flood waters. Beni receives a special medicine delivery from vet Arga. Plus: more nursery newbies arrive.

programme.sub-title: Battle to Save a Sea Lion
programme.desc: The Rescue team tries to save an otter as Dr Marty battles rough conditions to help an entangled sea lion. At the Rescue Centre, a mischievous seal pup puts himself in danger.

programme.desc: Dr Amandas team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but another is released post-rehab. Checking on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centres baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: The Key

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro

programme.title: The House on Sorority Row
programme.desc: Seven sorority sisters throw a graduation party and play a prank that goes horribly wrong. Ending up with a dead body, they panic and try to hide it. But someone witnessed the crime and begins to murder them, one by one, in this cult classic.

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess heads to Wyatt Ranches in South Texas to check out the cattle ranching operation theyve been running since 1965.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess visits Northstar Bison to learn about the small family-run ranchs breeding and processing operation, then prepares her signature smash burger.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.sub-title: Live Fire Venison Backstrap in Oklahoma
programme.desc: With the help of a local Oklahoma guide, Jess sets out to hunt an axis deer, then shares butchery techniques and prepares a delicious backstrap grilled over live fire.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess visits the East Foundation in South Texas to participate in a fast-paced, yet careful and methodical deer capture.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess heads to Oklahoma, where she takes aim at one of the states estimated 1.5 million feral hogs. Then, she makes a wild hog sausage roll with jalapeno and cheddar.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.sub-title: Alpine Lamb Ribs from Siddoway Sheep Company
programme.desc: Jess joins the lamb-raising Siddoway family as they begin sorting the animals that are ready for processing. She then returns to the lodge, where she demonstrates how to prepare and grill lamb ribs.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.sub-title: Smoked Elk Sandwiches at Juniper Mountain Ranch
programme.desc: Jess and her friend Shaundi Campbell meet up with guides from Juniper Mountain Ranch in southeastern Idaho to cull an elk for her smoked elk sandwiches.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess and her good friends, Fort Worth pitmaster Joe Riscky and Chef Juan Rodriguez, prepare a traditional barbacoa feast.

programme.sub-title: The Secret to Texas-Style Smoked Brisket
programme.desc: Pat and his buddy Leonard Botello use the flavors of the beloved native Post Oak to smoke a perfect Central Texas-style beef brisket.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade is joined by Lou Sanders for a two-day blast around Bergen, in Norway. Richard and Lou start as they mean to go on by taking a speedboat transfer from the airport to their waterfront lodgings. They explore the historic neighbourhood of Bryggen, ride a cable car to the top of Mount Ulriken, and fly down the the fastest zipline in Norway, against Richards better judgement.

programme.title: Borderforce: Americas Gatekeepers
programme.desc: A woman is suspected of smuggling someone elses baby over the border. Drugs are found hidden in a consignment of carrots. A pill smuggler is caught following an earlier tip-off.

programme.title: Railroad Australia

programme.title: Special Ops: Crime Squad UK
programme.desc: A never-before-seen look into the real-life criminal investigations of the UKs most talented and successful sleuths who tackle some of the UKs most challenging criminal cases.

programme.title: Special Ops: Crime Squad UK
programme.desc: Raw footage and powerful police testimony reveals the tragic reality of policing our roads and a ground-breaking investigation into the Body in the River murder.

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad
programme.desc: A young rider is lucky to be alive after plunging down an unstable mineshaft on his motorbike. Team Salvage is in Kalgoorlie, the gold mining capital of Australia, to try and retrieve the damaged bike. They have five hours and a 4,500-dollar budget to compete this highly dangerous retrieval. The whole area is unstable and the bike is jammed 10-metres down a shaft.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: This episode features Italian sports cars, military manoeuvres and a trip to Belgium. Richard Hammond on is the shores of Lake Como testing the exciting new Alfa Romeo 4C. Actor Tom Hiddleston is the star in the reasonably priced car.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson celebrates the return of the hand-crafted, coachbuilt car with a trip to Italy to drive the achingly beautiful and incredibly rare Alfa Romeo-based Touring Disco Volante. Jack Whitehall is the star in the reasonably priced car.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: The Bikers explore the impact our colonial past has had on our food. From the chai in their bread and butter pudding to the India Pale Ale in their sausage casserole, many recipes owe much to the Empire. Dave and Si also explore the history behind gin and tonic as well as Lee and Perrins, both of which arose from our Imperial history.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and Joe Wilkinson whizz round the historic Polish city of Krakow. Polands second city is known for its culture, fairy-tale old town and baked goods. The pair dive headlong into a baking workshop, making Krakows signature salty snack, before heading to a salt mine to marvel at the worlds largest underground chapel. They also enjoy vodka and pickles followed by pierogi dumplings before visiting a stained glass workshop for some soldering.

programme.desc: Gwent Police tackle the deadly impact of drugs on their community by taking down a violent gang in Newport and hunting down an addicted armed robber.

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad
programme.desc: Safety Bay Beach in Western Australia has been hit by gale force winds and a vessel named Unhinged has been torn from its anchorage and washed ashore. This is the third time it has happened to the unlucky owner. Team Salvage has four hours and 5,000 dollars to re-float the vessel and tow it to a safe new mooring. Job two is a time-critical operation. The team responds to a caravan park in trouble with the law.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Richard Hammond is in Abu Dhabi to drive an incredible new hybrid sports car from Porsche. Clarkson and James May are tasked with shooting a public information film to promote safer cycling, and `Breaking Bad star Aaron Paul tries the Astra.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are in Russia for an incredible race across the vast and beautiful urban landscape of St Petersburg. With a tiny Renault, a bicycle and a hovercraft they race each other and The Stig.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: The Bikers explore the `special relationship between America and Britains culinary cultures. They make a rich clam chowder and even richer chocolate brownies before visiting the Savoy to discuss the history of the cocktail. Plus, Dave and Si show how the farmers market is one of the UKs favourite American imports.

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick Stein meets young chef Tom Adams, who runs Combeshead Farm, a leading field-to-fork restaurant in Cornwall. Here they grow and produce all of their own food, from sourdough bread to pork pies, as well as rearing a small heard of Mangalitsa pigs.

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall
programme.desc: The town of Launceston in east Cornwall is bypassed by many who visit the county, yet Rick discovers that its home to an unusual superstition and a rare type of Norman castle. Rick meets two musicians who combine modern and traditional ways.

programme.desc: Its chicken week. The cooks get the chance to compete for the prize of a lifetime, getting their spice marinade onto Nandos menus in over 450 restaurants across the UK. In the Level Up, the cooks have to create an extraordinary side dish to go with chicken, and they have just one hour to do it. Those who impress land a spot in the restaurant kitchen, where they are safe from elimination and get to compete for the prize. The others have to fight for survival in the pop-up.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo heads for the Last Frontier of the United States armed with his 1899 Appletons Guide-Book to Alaska. Beginning his journey amid the snow-capped mountains and ice-cold inlets of the Kenai Peninsula, Michael finds the golden onion domes of a Russian Orthodox church along with traditional Russian food and costume and discovers that, 150 years ago, Alaska was a Russian colony.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his 1899 Appletons Guidebook to Alaska, Michael Portillo rides the Alaska Railroad north to explore the remote former gold rush settlement of Talkeetna. Deep in the forest outside town, Michael gets a taste of the pioneering spirit of early 20th century prospectors and settlers from a modern day `homesteader and helps fell a tree to clear land for a log cabin.

programme.title: Adolf Hitlers War
programme.desc: Hitlers War moves to its endgame as the Soviets cross the German border. With a death toll of over 40 million, a new, scarred Europe will emerge.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: America entered conflict after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, but the conflict in Europe and the conflict in the Pacific were two separate wars. Many Americans would have been content to forget about Hitler and Europe. Despite opposition from congress President Roosevelt, however, was committed to fighting Hitler. Eventually Hitler declared war on America, thus relieving Roosevelt of a difficult decision.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A second helping from Bath, where Fiona Bruce and the team welcome visitors to the magnificent Assembly Rooms. Cameras focus in on family treasures including a rare teapot bought at a boot sale, an unusual image of Hitler depicted in propaganda posters, and a painting of a gentle Irish landscape hides a dramatic valuation.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head to Blists Hill Victorian Town near Ironbridge in Shropshire. programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a second spectacular rail journey through Alaska into Canada on the White Pass and Yukon railway. Arriving in Skagway by seaplane from railwayless Juneau, Michael heads first for Dyea and the Chilkoot trail, which the first gold prospectors hiked a hundred years ago to the Klondike. Among them, he discovers, was author, Jack London, whose stories of sled dogs captured the spirit of the gold rush.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores British Columbia, steered by his Appletons Guide to Canada, published in 1899. He discovers how two superpowers nearly came to war over a pig and joins the Royal Canadian Navy to firefight on board the frigate HMCS Regina. Starting on Vancouver Island, Michael explores the rich British heritage and colonial past of the provincial capital of British Columbia, Victoria.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave goes to Wales in order to purchase a Sierra Cosworth, a sought-after car in the bidding market. Dad Derek gets his hands on a more sedate 1926 Standard Tourer - a quirky little motor.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to Suffolk to collect two Bentleys with a majestic pedigree, with their own names: Cynthia a stunning 1963 S3 and Harry, a 1965 Continental.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.desc: The untold secret story of war production that shaped the Second World War, beginning with how the German aviation industry came to dominate the skies of Europe.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: The North Africa campaign, Montys Desert Rats against Rommels Korps, was about heat, thirst, flies, sandstorms and 600 miles of sand. The combatants speak.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit a packed Leeds Town Hall for another busy day of valuations. Among the items intriguing the experts are a valuable diamond brooch left as security for an unpaid off-licence bill, and a 15th-century spoon found by a builder while digging a trench. Also, the price of a single glass nearly induces heart failure in one lucky owner.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The programme makes a return visit to Leeds Town Hall as Fiona Bruce and the team of experts set up for another busy day. Objects under scrutiny include an enormous sculpture of carved elephants weighing a ton and bought on the internet, a gold ring from the 16th century dug up in a field, and a doll with a tragic tale is brought out of her glass case for the first time in a hundred years.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rusty 1970 Fiat 500 goes under the hammer - Derek reckons its the kind of vehicle that is so iconic that it has to be saved.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head to Yorkshire, where a packed house awaits at Saltaires Victoria Hall. Among the family treasures attracting the specialists attention are a doodle by Lowry worth a small fortune, two pieces purporting to be have been owned by Napoleon, and the oldest bronze seen in all 33 years of the show.

programme.title: Great Indian Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael embarks on a rail journey from the Thar Desert in Rajasthan to the Indian capital, taking in desert landscapes and dazzling historic palaces. From Jodhpur, Michael strikes out into the desert, taking a camel ride to a village where life has changed little in centuries, before embarking on the Jaipur-Agra-Delhi `Golden Triangle tour, Indias must-do itinerary in 1913 as today.

programme.title: Chandni
programme.desc: Rohit and Chandni become engaged in spite of their families refusal, based on their class differences, but when Rohit loses the function of his legs in a road accident, he leaves Chandni rather than placing a burden on her. Years later, Rohit has made a full recovery, and sets out to find Chandni, but when he does, she is engaged to another man.

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: Petty thieves Tara and Sitara get on the bad side of two wanted criminals, namely Panther and Cobra. On the run, they end up at the home of Major Ram Singh, who takes them in, but is eventually betrayed by them.

programme.title: Holiday: A Soldier Is Never Off Duty
programme.desc: After a bomb destroys the bus on which he was riding, a military officer foregoes his vacation to hunt down a terrorist and the sleeper cells under his command.

programme.title: Tarla
programme.desc: The journey of Indias iconic home chef, Tarla Dalal. It captures the integral role she played in empowering women and helping them realise their dreams through food.

programme.title: Udta Punjab
programme.desc: The insurgence of substance abuse among the young in the Indian state of Punjab through the stories of a rock star, a migrant laborer, a doctor and a policeman.

programme.title: Rashtra Kavach Om
programme.desc: In his pursuit of an advanced military technology called "Kavach", an Indian para-commando must confront the ghosts of his past, haunting him from Kasauli to Armenia.

programme.desc: Anu, a kind 20-year-old, and Aryavardhan, a resolute 45-year-old businessman, defy societal norms and family resistance, overcoming struggles to demonstrate that love transcends age or boundaries.

programme.title: Saru
programme.desc: A kabaddi champion from Rajasthan moves to Mumbai, where she battles all odds, reunites with her family, and fights to get her mother her rightful place in the family while chasing her dreams.

programme.title: Ganga Mai Ki Betiyaan
programme.desc: Ganga Mai is a resilient woman who is deserted by her husband for not giving birth to a son. Refusing to bow to societal expectations, she devotes herself to raising her three daughters with unwavering strength, grace, and affection.

programme.title: Jagriti
programme.desc: To empower her marginalised Chitta community, Jagriti challenges the age-old traditions and locks horns with its leader who works for the mafia.
